hero.description: Frontend-focused Fullstack JavaScript Developer with 6+ years of experience creating scalable, reliable applications using JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node.js, and related ecosystems. Adept at bridging design and engineering teams, I deliver solutions aligned with best practices like TDD, DRY, KISS, and SOLID principles. Skilled in building user-centric applications and optimizing development workflows for maximum efficiency.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Turning complex ideas into elegant and user-friendly web applications
about.description1: Hi, I’m Basit Ali, a Berlin-based Frontend-focused Fullstack JavaScript Developer passionate about crafting modern, scalable web applications. With over 6 years of experience, I specialize in leveraging the power of JavaScript and TypeScript to create user-friendly, efficient, and reliable digital solutions.

data.title: Frontend Development
data.description: Building responsive, visually appealing user interfaces using React.js, ensuring seamless interactions and exceptional user experiences across all devices.

data.title: Backend Development
data.description: Engineering robust APIs and scalable server-side architectures with Node.js, NestJS, and Express.js, while leveraging modern tools like Prisma for efficient database management..

data.title: Database Technologies
data.description: Skilled in working with relational and non-relational databases, including MySQL, Postgres, and DynamoDB, to ensure optimal data integrity and performance.

data.title: Ecosystem Mastery
data.description: Proficient in working with state management tools (like Redux, Context API), component libraries, and bundlers (like Webpack, Vite).

data.title: Testing & Optimization
data.description: Proficient in testing and optimizing web applications for maximum performance, accessibility, and user satisfaction.

data.title: Bridging Design & Development
data.description: Collaborating with design teams to translate concepts into fully functional, pixel-perfect implementations while maintaining accessibility standards.

data.title: AI & Workflow Optimization Enthusiast
data.description: Exploring the latest advancements in AI, Generative AI, LLMs, and N8N workflows to integrate cutting-edge technologies into practical, daily applications.

data.title: Problem Solver at Heart
data.description: From debugging complex systems to optimizing performance, I thrive on tackling challenges with innovative, effective solutions.

data.title: Best Practices & Collaboration
data.description: With a strong commitment to principles like TDD, DRY, KISS, and SOLID, I ensure code quality and maintainability. I value teamwork and believe collaboration is the cornerstone of successful software development.

love-to-do.title: Why I Love What I Do
love-to-do.description: Web development isn’t just a job; it’s a creative outlet that lets me blend technical expertise with imaginative problem-solving. I’m motivated by the opportunity to improve lives through technology, one line of code at a time.

beyond-work.title: Beyond Work
description: I’m deeply interested in the transformative power of AI, Generative AI, and LLMs, exploring their potential to enhance workflows and solve real-world problems. Tools like N8N workflows excite me, as they bring automation and intelligence to everyday tasks. Outside of tech, I enjoy diving into Pashto poetry, volunteering for meaningful causes, and constantly experimenting with new frameworks to stay ahead in this ever-evolving field.
I’m always excited to take on new challenges, collaborate with like-minded professionals, and contribute to impactful projects. Let’s create something incredible together!

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.subtitle: Where I've Worked
experience.description: I've had the opportunity to work with some amazing companies. Here's a quick overview of my professional journey.

sp-global.title: Frontend Developer
sp-global.description: S&P Global provides market data, technology solutions, and financial insights to businesses and governments worldwide.
responsibilities: Developed responsive, user-friendly web applications using React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Redux.
Implemented complex UI components using Bootstrap, Tailwind, MUI, and Ant CSS in JS libraries.
Optimized performance and accessibility of the user interface.
Implemented comprehensive testing and performance optimization using Jest, Cypress, and various tools.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
Participated in code reviews and provided constructive feedback to fellow developers.
Implement state management with Redux, Context API & React Query for enhanced performance and accessibility.
Lead Agile development with daily scrums, ensuring seamless collaboration across teams.
Contribute to Capital IQ Pro, a premier financial intelligence platform, by developing scalable, modular frontends.

iplex.title: Frontend Developer
iplex.description: iPlex is a top-rated digital agency specializing in software development, web applications, and digital marketing for businesses in the U.S.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained React-based applications with a focus on performance, UX, and cross-platform compatibility.
Created scalable, themable web applications for easy project replication.
Implemented complex UI components using Bootstrap, Tailwind, MUI, and Ant CSS in JS libraries.
Conducted daily code reviews to ensure stability, performance, and adherence to Agile methodologies.
Led frontend development for Al Habib Pharmacy E-commerce Platform using Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
Developed a centralized data management system for Salam Telecom DMS Portal for transactions, balance recharges, and user activity.

skills.description: My technical toolkit has been refined over 6+ years of professional experience, focusing on both frontend and backend technologies, as well as modern development practices. Here’s a comprehensive overview of the skills and expertise I bring to the table:

job-copilot.title: Job Copilot
job-copilot.description: The Job Copilot is an intelligent job application assistant that helps you track, manage, and automate your job search. Whether you're applying to multiple positions or following up on leads, this tool keeps everything organized in one place.

quantum.title: Quantum Trading Platform
quantum.description: A fintech trading platform featuring real-time data visualization, WebSockets, and machine learning integrations.

smart-home.title: Smart Home Automation
smart-home.description: The Smart Home Automation platform enables users to control and monitor their smart home devices effortlessly. With real-time updates, scheduling automation, and voice assistant integration, it provides a seamless and intelligent home management experience.

talent-matrix.title: Talent Matrix
talent-matrix.description: Talent Matrix is a modern HR job posting and application tracking system designed to simplify recruitment workflows. Whether you're an HR professional, hiring manager, or recruiter, Talent Matrix streamlines job postings, tracks applications, and enhances hiring efficiency with a user-friendly interface.

impact-cv.title: Impact CV
impact-cv.description: ImpactCV is a modern, intuitive, and user-friendly web application designed to empower you to create professional and impactful resumes (CVs) with ease. Whether you're just starting your career or looking to make a change, ImpactCV provides the tools and flexibility you need to showcase your skills and experience effectively.
